job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>An employer is seeking a Senior .Net Developer/Application Architect to join their Application Development Services department on site in Middletown, CT.&nbsp;You will be part of a team of developers tasked with supporting the agencies custom software applications.&nbsp;The position entails supporting legacy ASP.Net applications, upgrading existing applications to the latest technology and general maintenance of existing applications and everything in between.</p><p><br></p><p> -Architectural design for all application development projects </p><p> -Responsible for making sure all technology conforms to State of CT and HIPAA standards </p><p> -Data modeling </p><p> -Development Lead&nbsp;</p>
